name: Russian Trucks Offroad 3D
description:
Meet our new driving game for real men and become a professional Russian SUV driver in our offroad driving simulator!

Test the power of russian truck. Try the driving across offroad terrain and enjoy the offroad atmosphere. Jump to the cabin of Russian truck, be in time and don't underestimate UAZ 4x4 truck. Explore all offroad ways to drive your Russian transport in the driving simulator.

Features of Russian Trucks Offroad 3D:

- Difficult missions
- Free Ride and Career
- Powerful Russian trucks
- Many types of trucks
- Offroad SUV driving simulator
- 3D graphics
- Truck upgrades
- Easy SUV driving controls

Feel like an offroad SUV driver with our driving simulator! Use a navigation map to find the route. Drive as a professional Russian truck UAZ, ZiL, KRaZ or MAZ driver with our simulator, forget about comfortable driving. Fight with rough offroad terrain! Deep into the offroad SUV driving. Drive a Russian truck and do offroad tasks in Russian Trucks Offroad 3D.

Do you like offroad? Today is the best day to drive a Russian truck in our SUV simulator. Pay driver's attention to simulator's economy - spend money on upgrades to improve your trucks. Get ready for offroad missions. Try driving SUV without roads and do missions. Complete driving orders and drive Russian truck UAZ from one location to another. Be fast, Russian men are waiting for your truck.

Explore offroad terrains with hills and mud! Road is challenging, driver! Learn how to drive Russian truck and be accurate. Try easy truck controls we made in the simulator. You still have a chance to lose the control of your truck.

So, it is time to try our Russian Trucks Offroad 3D.
Drive a truck to feel the power of Russian transport!
